PopUp Window with Colorized Text
This extension was designed to assist dyslexic readers, beginning readers and other readers with a variety of learning challenges. This tool colorizes syllables throughout a paragraph emphasizing the structure of each word and making it easier to see and pronounce. It also emphasizes the punctuation at the end of each sentence to help the reader keep their place.

Simple to Use
1.  Add "ReadWithColor" to your computer by clicking "Add to Chrome" at the bottom of this page.

2.  Select text on any web page and click the ReadWithColor icon found in the upper right hand corner of your window. A popup window will appear with your text colorized and graphically transformed.

3.  Click on "Options" to personalize your text environment:
Options include a choice of background color, syllable color, font size and font style.

4.  Printing on a color printer and Saving the selected file:

First, click on the "Print/Save" button and make sure that your "Background graphics" setting is checked under the "More settings" drop down menu.

To PRINT the contents of the pop-up window, click on the "Print/Save" button and under the "Destination" drop down menu, choose a printer associated with your computer. 
 
To SAVE the contents, click on the “Print/Save” button and under the "Destination" drop down menu, choose "Save as PDF."
